#Text= Zaheer says : " It 's a pleasure to finally meet a true airbending master .

column1: #Text=" Tenzin says : " What is it you want from us ?
#Text=In fact , if everyone cooperates , you will all walk out of this situation unharmed .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Then what are you doing here ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I want Korra , and I 'm tired of chasing her .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You 're using us as leverage .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I will never let you get to Korra .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Unfortunately , you do n't have a choice .
#Text=Bumi , Kya , help me hold them off !
#Text=And stay out of her line of sight !
